      <h1>Statistics, ML & Valid Inference with AI-Predicted Data</h1>
      <p>
      I build statistical methodology and software for inference with AI/ML-generated data,
      including post-prediction inference (PPI / Post-PI), survey-weighted estimators, and
      hybrid pipelines for biomedical applications (e.g., GTEx, NLST, automated karyotyping).
      </p>
      <p>
      I lead development of the <em>scorcher</em> R framework for multimodal transformers and
      prediction-powered inference, and collaborate on clinical tools that must be robust
      on CPU-only production networks.
      </p>
